parsed_action.reasoning: With no disruptive events and healthy inventory, implement a moderate price-optimization test: small increases to probe elasticity while protecting sell-through. Highest inventory (Apparel) gets the largest bump to capture margin if demand holds; Electronics receives a moderate increase; Home Goods, with lowest inventory, gets a minimal increase to sustain velocity. Prices end in .49/.99 for psychological pricing. We will monitor sales velocity and adjust if conversion drops.
